entries.meaning: A case for carrying a tool, particularly a gun, safely and accessibly.
A belt with loops or slots for carrying small tools or other equipment.

verbs.description: holster (third-person singular simple present holsters, present participle holstering, simple past and past participle holstered)

entries.meaning: To put something in a holster.
